{"id":1182087494,"question_id":3329,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1708528168,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"788 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1182087494/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Length of the Longest Common Prefix","memory":"29.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def longestCommonPrefix(self, arr1: List[int], arr2: List[int]) -> int:\n        def prefixCount(s1, s2):\n            ans = 0\n            for i in range(min(len(s1), len(s2))):\n                if s1[i] == s2[i]: ans += 1\n                else: break\n            return ans\n        ans = 0\n        arr1 = sorted(list(map(str, arr1)))\n        arr2 = sorted(list(map(str, arr2)))\n        i, j, n, m = 0, 0, len(arr1), len(arr2)\n        while i < n and j < m:\n            #print(i, j, arr1[i], arr2[j], type(arr1[i]), type(arr2[j]))\n            ans = max(ans, prefixCount(arr1[i], arr2[j]))\n            if arr1[i] == arr2[j]: \n                i += 1\n                j += 1\n            elif arr1[i] > arr2[j]:\n                j += 1\n            else: \n                i += 1\n        return ans\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-length-of-the-longest-common-prefix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
